title: Chat and Screen Sharing Application, Chatella
description: Developed a chat application for sending text messages, voice messages, video call, voice call, and screen share. All in real-time.

title: File Sharing, Storing, Viewing, and Downloading Platform, TubeTransfer
description: Developed a platform for storing, sharing, viewing and downloading different types of files.

title: E-Commerce Cosmetic Website, Cosmetico
description: Developed 'Cosmetico,' an e-commerce platform for a fictional cosmetics retailer, featuring secure login/signup, a shop, shopping cart, and dynamic forms. Built with PHP, jQuery, and MySQL.

title: Product Recommendation Website, TechinEZ
description: TechinEZ is a website designed to simplify the process of finding and comparing tech products across various e-commerce websites. The website employs web scraping technology to gather product information based on user input, specifications, and budget constraints. Users can input the name of a product, set their budget, and add specific attributes to narrow down their search.

title: Automatic PNG Image Trimmer
description: Designed a website that automatically crops png images with transparent backgrounds. Removing irrelevant spaces.

description: Designed a website for a made-up company called 'UPRAID'

description: I developed an app that renames your files with a any popular naming convention

description: I developed a text editor with C# windows forms

title: Task Management Android App
description: I built a task management app where you can create schedules, reminders, and to-do lists.

title: My Programming Language, Garbio
